name: Blind Bounty
description:
Note: Needs Processing 2

A short prototype made in a day with processing.

You play as a bounty hunter on his way to killing a dastardly skin walker. On your way through the najavo, you'll begin to run out of water. Water in the desert is precious, if you run out of water, your journey comes to a short end. On your way you'll encounter lots of different folk. Some who mean you harm, some who will help... for a price!

Music is Fistful of Dollars by Ennio Morricone
